title: Language Proficiency Improvement Course Through Peer Interaction in Blended eLearning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate language proficiency and basic digital literacy
context.additional_context: A course where in-service professionals enhance language competencies and develop practical application skills through collaborative interactions with peers.

learning_goals: Learners improve communication skills by over 20% through collaborative activities with peers while performing language tasks
Learners develop four language-related outputs (portfolio, presentation materials, feedback reports, project deliverables) through blended online/offline activities based on constructivist approaches
Learners provide specific and actionable feedback on peers' work at least three times according to a peer assessment system
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
